body.name: Fubbles Bubbles No-Spill Bubbles Tumbler | Bubble toy for babies toddlers and kids of all ages | Includes 4oz bubble Solution and bubble wand (tumbler colors may vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: NO SPILL: The No Spill design allows for all the bubble fun without any of the mess. It works like magic and really is No Spill! Finally a bubble toy you can play with both outside and inside activties.
INCLUDES: 4oz of non toxic bubble solution, and is easy to refill. Its The perfect first bubble toy for any age and so easy to use that any baby, toddler and kid will be delighted every time.

BEST BUBBLE TOY FOR TODDLERS: Designed with kids in mind the No Spill Bubble Tumbler is designed to help children learn with bubbles. Follows the montessori education of inspiring children to learn through play.

BRING THE FUN: The Fubbles No Spill Tumblers are the perfect toys for the beach, pool, backyard, park, water and any other outdoor activity. It makes an incredible party favor, easter basket stuffer, and birthday gift for girls and boys
SAFETY FIRST: Fubbles bubbles are non-toxic and the only bubble toy safety tested for 18 months+. Tumbler colors will vary.
Multiple Award Winner Oppenheim Toy Portfolio's Gold Seal, Parents' Choice Classic and National Parenting Publication Award
Durable, innovative and patented design eliminates bubble spills
body.description: Product Description For fun with bubbles, it can only be Fubbles! Tip it upside down, knock it over..it’s no spill! Designed to allow kids to have all the fun without any of the mess and no mess = more smiles. As the perfect first bubble toy for any toddler and kid, it really works like magic. The Fubbles No-Spill Bubble Tumbler is the perfect addition to any party, picnic, beach day, and indoor or outdoor activity. The Tumbler comes in assorted colors and includes a wand and 4 oz of bubble solution. Simply pour the solution into the bottom cup, twist on the top, and you are ready to play. It works with any bubble refill. The No Spill Bubble Tumbler is great for party favors, party supplies, easter basket stuffers, easter basket toys and is the perfect for indoors and outdoors activities. It is time to get back to playing wtih bubbles in its most organic form. Forget all the automatic bubble machines, bubble lawn mowers, bubble leaf blowers, bubble blasters and get back to basics. Let your kids really learn how to play with bubbles. It is bubble fun for the whole family: babies, toddlers, kids, adults and even the dog will enjoy these bubbles. Ages 18 months+ From the Manufacturer Drop it knock it over turn it upside down it's No-Spill. The durable, innovative and patented design eliminates bubble spills and keeps liquid inside for more bubble fun. Don't be fooled by imitations - our No-Spill Bubble Tumbler is still the original and still the best. Includes wand and 4 oz. of Fubbles Premium Bubble Solution. Colors may vary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality is good, and the fact that its spill proof is an added bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves these and love that he can do them on his own with little mess. These are not completely leak proof, but it’s better than a bottle of bubbles. Easy to clean little spills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have this product and am buying this for a birthday gift. It allows toddlers to hold their own bubbles and blow their own bubbles with out making a mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cool and fun and awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I was secretly excited myself about this purchase. I was looking forward to the whole turn it upside down moment, but when I did...it actually leaked a bit. Was a slight disappointment. Can't deny how cool it is that the solution doesn't just pour out tho. So, all in all a fun purchase, definitely minimizes the mess factor, but not completely. I'm pretty sure the leak is really the solution dripping off of the wand. But, anyway...not a big deal. We love it. Just be warned. It's SPILL-PROOF, not LEAK-PROOF.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: My one year old loves bubbles and always insists on doing it herself. This makes both of us enjoy doing bubbles a lot more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really does not leak!
reviews.reviewText: These really are great and very hard to spill. I have tried flipping it upside down and even then the liquid stays in. Now if you turn it upside and shake obviously some will come out. I love this product and suggest it for any kids in your life since bubbles can get messy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good idea but only fair product
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't leak but also doesn't make bubbles easily. Frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still the same awesome bubbles
reviews.reviewText: I got these bubbles for my baby and dog and they were very entertained. The bubbles definitely don’t leak. I do wish that Fubbles had more sustainable packaging. It would be great if they could switch to using a tablet where you just added water for your bubble solution. Overall, I think Fubbles Bubbles is a great product for kids, but I hope they can make some changes to become more eco-friendly.

Muy buen material, perfecto agarre para adultos y niños. Cero derrames. Lo único es que si me gustaría que se pudiera elegir el color. Porque te envían el que el proveedor quiera o tenga disponible. Realmente vale lo cuesta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2017
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing how it won’t spill but empty the bottle into the pot. The actual bubble mixture doesn’t seem brilliant though. We haven’t had many bubbles.

Exceeded my expectations! I ended up ordering a second one after my kids started fighting over the first one we bought. Lives up to the leak proof promise and, unlike some of the reviews I've seen, I have found the wands work great and are holding up just fine so far. My three year old can finally blow his own bubbles! Best part is that they can be refilled with any bubble solution once the initial supply is done. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Definitely not worth the price. The solution you get with it, is rubbish. For the price tag. I’d recommend get something else.
